item.description:
6:00pm Holiday Party!

Come meet and mingle with fellow technologists, designers, and bloggers from Greater New Haven, in an informal setting. No cover: just RSVP here and show up! There will be food, cheer, booze, and networking (although not necessarily in that order).

7:00pm WordPress Presentation

While WordPress isn't inherently "social" off-the-shelf, there are a number of ways to enhance your WordPress-powered blog to connect with and publish to social media. You can even use WordPress to build your own social network. Tony Zeoli, founder of Digital Strategy Works, will discuss how you can enhance WordPress with social tools, which enable you to track your social performance, cross post into social networks, or turn your website into a niche social hub! This was one of the most heavily attended presentations at this year's WordCamp Raleigh. Think you know everything there is to know about WordPress? Come anyway, you just might learn something.

Tony Zeoli is an experienced digital strategist and entrepreneur. Through his Digital Strategy Works consulting organization, Tony has assisted companies, non-profits, and institutions in the development and deployment of WordPress website, blogs, and social platforms.

--

I hope to see you!

-Zack
item.name: "But WordPress isn't social, right?" Presentation + Holiday Party!
